explains: n. 提醒物，引起回忆的事物；（提醒做某事的）提示信，通知单

sentences.en: This has been a timely reminder to us all.
sentences.cn: 对我们大家来说这个提醒非常及时。

sentences.en: His words were a pointed reminder of her position.
sentences.cn: 他刻意提醒了她的身份。

sentences.en: The accident was a salutary reminder of the dangers of climbing.
sentences.cn: 这次事故提醒人们注意登山的种种危险，倒也不无益处。
